name.ja: <ruby>Ｒ－ＡＣＥ<rt>レスキュー・エース</rt></ruby>アビトレイター

text.en:
2+ FIRE monsters
You can only Special Summon "Rescue-ACE Arbitrator(s)" once per turn. If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Rescue-ACE Hydrant" or "Rescue-ACE HQ" from your Deck or GY to your hand. If you activate a "Rescue-ACE" Quick-Play Spell Card/Normal Trap Card: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Rescue-ACE Arbitrator" twice per turn.
